snippet: The pontiff reflected on God’s mercy in front of an estimated 200,000 people in St. Peter’s Square, then wished them all a good lunch.
abstract: Pope Francis, in his first Sunday appearance from papal apartment overlooking St Peter's Square, charms crowd of 200,000 by infusing message of the Gospel with personal recollections and smattering of humor.
lead_paragraph: The pontiff reflected on God’s mercy in front of an estimated 200,000 people in St. Peter’s Square, then wished them all a good lunch.

headline.seo: Francis Charms Crowd on First Sunday as Pope
